text: Carmen Alborch Bataller (31 October 1947 – 24 October 2018) was a Spanish politician and writer. She was born in Castelló de Rugat, Valencia, Spain. She was a member of the Spanish Socialist Workers' Party. Alborch was Minister of Culture from 1993 to 1996 in the last government of Felipe González. In 1996, Alborch was elected to the Congress of Deputies, representing Valencia. She chaired the Committee of Control of RTVE (the state radio and TV corporation) from 1996 until January 2000.Profile at Barcelona2004.org Alborch died at the age of 70 on 24 October 2018 from pancreatic cancer in Valencia.Muere la exministra Carmen Alborch a los 70 años ==References== ==Other websites== * * * Category:1947 births Category:2018 deaths Category:Deaths from pancreatic cancer Category:Spanish politicians Category:Spanish writers Category:Feminist writers
title: Carmen Alborch
